block_2_text: We would like to make farmers life easier! Data vizualization is an important part in decision making. To sell, or not to sell - that is the question... And when!
block_3_text: We are someonce who want to increase yours incomes!
block_4_text: We pull data from official ukrainian goverment statistic portal : https://agro.me.gov.ua/
drag_and_drop_file: Drag & drop or click here to select files
upload_description_rule_1: First column contains values for chart's X axis
upload_description_rule_2: Rest of columns contains series data. There are no limit related to number of lines. Cells must contain numbers in string or number formats.
upload_description_rule_3: Use dots instead of commas for floating point numbers
upload_description_rule_4: Use commas instead of semicolons for columns separations (.csv format)
